00022 template<typename T1, typename eop_type>
00023 class eOpCube : public BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, eOpCube<T1, eop_type> >
00024   {
00025   public:
00026   
00027   typedef typename T1::elem_type                   elem_type;
00028   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00029   
00030   const ProxyCube<T1> P;
00031   
00032   const elem_type aux;        //!< storage of auxiliary data, user defined format
00033   const u32       aux_u32_a;  //!< storage of auxiliary data, u32 format
00034   const u32       aux_u32_b;  //!< storage of auxiliary data, u32 format
00035   const u32       aux_u32_c;  //!< storage of auxiliary data, u32 format
00036   
00037   inline         ~eOpCube();
00038   inline explicit eOpCube(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T1>& in_m);
00039   inline          eOpCube(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T1>& in_m, const elem_type in_aux);
00040   inline          eOpCube(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T1>& in_m, const u32 in_aux_u32_a, const u32 in_aux_u32_b);
00041   inline          eOpCube(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T1>& in_m, const u32 in_aux_u32_a, const u32 in_aux_u32_b, const u32 in_aux_u32_c);
00042   inline          eOpCube(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T1>& in_m, const elem_type in_aux, const u32 in_aux_u32_a, const u32 in_aux_u32_b, const u32 in_aux_u32_c);
00043   inline          eOpCube(const u32 in_n_rows, const u32 in_n_cols, const u32 in_n_slices);
00044   
00045   };
